title: Mouse/Keyboard buttons/strokes not working in-game
body:
I decided to try out league of legends after a small hiatus. Unfortunately I ended up letting my team down in the very first game, and I haven't been able to even get one game where I actually play yet.

As soon as I've loaded unto the rift, my mouse and keyboard seems to have no function whatsoevever. 

Mouse: I can move the cursor and map by moving it to the edges. I can also hover over buttons and get hints. None of the buttons work however.
Keyboard: No keyboard strokes are working, none, whatsoever. Not even escape, space etc, nothing, it seems completely dead. I can alt+tab, ctrl+alt+del, ctrl+esc. They work, and will bring me out of the game. The keyboard is working, just not in-game.

I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, I've tried deleting the config folder, and I've tried importing input.ini file config files, from another pc. A pc with same exact keyboard and mouse..

I'm using a LG Orion Spark and ROCCAT KONE XTD.

I've also tried uninstalling all third party software, the problem still persist.

I've search forum and google far and wide, but I can't seem to find anyone experiencing the same problem. All seem to have defective input.ini, but can still use the mouse/keyboard, just not bindings. My buttons just don't work. 

Looking forward to a solution :)

replies.body:
Weeeeeell not being able to use your mouse/keyboard makes things a little difficult eh?

Typically resetting those config files will do the trick, but since that didn't help let's go ahead and get you set up with a little one on one help with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can look a lot deeper than I can here on the boards so you'll be in good hands!
I've begun the process of the zendesk, hopefully we'll find a solution xD
